sentences.en: A postmortem showed that the victim had been poisoned.
sentences.cn: 表明受害者是被毒死的.

sentences.en: A postmortem was carried out to establish the cause of death.
sentences.cn: 进行了尸检以确定死因。

sentences.en: An early postmortem examination concluded that Tomlinson died a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 一次早先的尸检得出结论汤姆林森死于心脏病.

sentences.en: At postmortem, brain changes typical of Alzheimer's disease were found.
sentences.cn: 在对其的尸检中, 发现阿尔兹罕默氏病的典型脑部改变.

sentences.en: Corneal opacity is one of the important postmortem changes.
sentences.cn: 角膜混浊是一种重要的死后变化.

sentences.en: Everyday two, postmortem room temperature plan record room temperature cost.
sentences.cn: 天天两次, 检视室温计并记录室温值.

sentences.en: GFAP + astrocytes hhd no changes and there were no VIM + astrocytes in postmortem groups.
sentences.cn: 死后脑干损伤组GFAP+星形胶质细胞无改变,创缘及创周无vim+星形胶质细胞出现.

sentences.en: Including: Lanhuo, storage, declaration, postmortem report, the mirror transport.
sentences.cn: 包括: 揽货 、 仓储 、 报关 、 报验 、 过镜运输.

sentences.en: Initially, his death was attributed by a police postmortem to natural causes.
sentences.cn: 起初, 警方验尸将其死因归于自然原因.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the police and the doctors involved the postmortem should be allowed to do their work.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 让负责此案的警员和医生去执行他们的工作吧.

sentences.en: Photoelectric eye - to - edge postmortem cloth!
The judgments were all based on postmortem examination reports.
sentences.cn: 这些判断全是建立在死后检查报告基础上的.

sentences.en: The meat was subject to postmortem veterinary inspection and found fit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 本批禽肉经宰后检验适合人类食用.

sentences.en: The postmortem stab wounds barely broke the surface.
sentences.cn: 死后的刺伤仅仅只是穿透了表面.

sentences.en: To study the distribution of IgG at wound edges to differentiate ante or postmortem injuries.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究损伤组织中的免疫球蛋白G( igG)的分布以区别生前与死后伤.

sentences.en: We describe the clinical, radiologic, and postmortem findings in a 49 - year - old woman with intravascular lymphomatosis.
sentences.cn: 我们报告一例49 岁 女性诊断为血管内淋巴瘤之临床表现 、 放射线学检查及解剖所见.

trans.tran_cn: ，验尸，尸体解剖；事后的，死后的
trans.tran_en: A postmortem is a medical examination of a dead person's body in order to find out how they died
